sense.def: Pathological Condition of a dian xian 癲癇 , peak-illness with epilepsy, which, at the time of its outbreaks, lets the patient’s four limbs twitch, accompanied by a shaking head and the body arching back, with spontaneous shaking. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 5: 雞癇之為病， 搖頭反折，喜驚自搖 , “The disease of chicken epilepsy : the head shakes and [the body] arches back, with a tendency to be frightened and exhibit spontaneous shaking”.
